spells.name: Adhesive Blood
spells.description: Attackers' weapons stick to your gluey blood.

spells.name: Blood Armor
spells.description: Your blood hardens when you are wounded, increasing your AC.

spells.name: Extreme Flexibility
spells.description: Gain a bonus to AC, on Escape Artist checks, and when grappling.

spells.name: Molten Orb
spells.description: Molten metal splash weapon deals 2d6 fire damage plus ongoing damage.

spells.name: Sonic Scream
spells.description: Create a cone of damaging sound at will.

spells.name: Stone Discus
spells.description: Flying discus deals bludgeoning or slashing damage.
